blogPost.excerpt: The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is an evidence-based motivational cum productivity tool designed to force you to finish a task everyday. The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is designed to break your procrastination habits by forcing you to complete one task everyday
blogPost.body: The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is an evidence-based motivational cum productivity tool designed to force you to finish a task everyday. The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is designed to break your procrastination habits by forcing you to complete one task everyday
blogPost.title: Fuckin' Kill It Calendar 2021 edition - Calendar that helps you get shit done
blogPost.author: Sachin

localize.description: 该死的杀死它的日历是一个以证据为基础的激励和生产力工具，旨在迫使你每天完成一项任务。“他妈的杀了它日历”旨在通过强迫你每天完成一项任务来打破你的拖延症习惯
localize.tagline: 帮助你完成垃圾任务的日历

localize.description: 該死的殺死它的日曆是一個以證據爲基礎的激勵和生產力工具，旨在迫使你每天完成一項任務。“他媽的殺了它日曆”旨在通過強迫你每天完成一項任務來打破你的拖延症習慣
localize.tagline: 幫助你完成垃圾任務的日曆

previous.excerpt: A variety of copy templates for different industries (E-commerce, SaaS, Travel, Content, Finance, Fashion etc) specifically designed for your needs (Welcome, Free Trial, Newsletters, Feedback, Account Upgrade, Anniversary, Announcement, Consent, Offer etc)
previous.title: Boost CTOR - A variety of ready-made email marketing copy templates

localize.description: 针对不同行业(电子商务、SaaS、旅游、内容、金融、时尚等)专门设计的各种复制模板(欢迎、免费试用、时事通讯、反馈、账户升级、周年纪念、公告、同意、优惠等)
localize.tagline: 各种现成的电子邮件营销文案模板

localize.description: 針對不同行業(電子商務、SaaS、旅遊、內容、金融、時尚等)專門設計的各種複製模板(歡迎、免費試用、時事通訊、反饋、賬戶升級、週年紀念、公告、同意、優惠等)
localize.tagline: 各種現成的電子郵件營銷文案模板

next.excerpt: - Ref Career is a tool to maximise your chances of getting referred to an opening in any firm looking for candidates. - Get in touch with employees currently working with the firm willing to refer a potential candidate for the job opening.
next.title: refCareer - Online database for referrals

localize.description: -推荐人职业生涯是一种工具，可以最大限度地增加你获得任何寻找候选人的公司空缺的机会。-联系目前在公司工作的员工，他们愿意推荐潜在的候选人来填补职位空缺。
-推薦人職業生涯是一種工具，可以最大限度地增加你獲得任何尋找候選人的公司空缺的機會。-聯繫目前在公司工作的員工，他們願意推薦潛在的候選人來填補職位空缺。
